name: Black Cat Pirates
jollyRoger: A cat skull with crossed bones

keyMoments.title: Crew Hypnotically Enhanced by Jango
keyMoments.description: Jango uses his hypnosis to dramatically increase the strength of multiple crew members, making them powerful enough to shatter rocks with their fists.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's strategic use of Jango's abilities as a force multiplier in battle.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Hypnotized Luffy
keyMoments.description: After Luffy is accidentally hypnotized with enhanced strength, he uses Gomu Gomu no Gatling to devastate numerous Black Cat Pirates, then tears off their ship's figurehead which crushes more crew members when dropped.
keyMoments.significance: A major setback for the crew showing how Jango's hypnosis can backfire spectacularly.

keyMoments.title: Nyaban Brothers Enter Battle
keyMoments.description: The elite officer duo Sham and Buchi are summoned from guarding the ship to engage Zoro in combat, revealing the crew's hierarchy and officer-level fighters.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the battle by deploying the crew's elite members, showing the depth of the Black Cat Pirates' forces.

keyMoments.title: Captain Kuro Arrives at Battle
keyMoments.description: Captain Kuro himself arrives at the northern slope, observing the ongoing battle with visible frustration at his crew's inability to quickly execute his plan.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kuro's perfectionist and impatient nature, foreshadowing his ruthlessness toward his own crew.

keyMoments.title: Attempt to Warn Kaya at the Mansion
keyMoments.description: Tamanegi, Ninjin, and Piiman attempt to enter Kaya's mansion through Usopp's secret entrance to warn her, but find it sealed. Unable to climb the high gates, they are frustrated in their efforts.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the children's loyalty to Usopp and their determination to help despite their youth and physical limitations.
